author: hwright
msg: Improve 'blame -g' performance by trimming previously reached path/revision
(find_interesting_revisions): When adding a path/revision pair to the list
of pairs to return, also add it to the duplicate_path_revs hash.  Check this
hash before processing a path/revision pair to make sure it isn't a duplicate.

author: glasser
msg: Follow-up to r29036: Remove references to indexes.sqlite.

author: cmpilato
msg: Replace random mutation but *un*-natural selection with intelligent design.
(compare_segments): Fix the casting and comparison in this function,
which has somehow managed to survive testing for months only because
pointer values happened to line up in just the right favorable way.
This was causing merge_tests.py 66 to fail for me, and only me, and
only recently, and only using the BDB backend.

author: hwright
msg: Add a comment about why we don't need to check authz for certain mergeinfo
